name: IsLocalRing.ker_residue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ Eq (RingHom.ker (IsLocalRing.residue R)) (IsLocalRing.maximalIdeal R)
decl:
lemma ker_residue : RingHom.ker (residue R) = maximalIdeal R :=
  Ideal.mk_ker

name: IsLocalRing.residue_eq_zero_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
x : R
⊢ Iff (Eq ((IsLocalRing.residue R) x) 0) (Membership.mem (IsLocalRing.maximalIdeal R) x)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma residue_eq_zero_iff (x : R) : residue R x = 0 ↔ x ∈ maximalIdeal R := by
  rw [← RingHom.mem_ker, ker_residue]

name: IsLocalRing.residue_ne_zero_iff_isUnit
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
x : R
⊢ Iff (Ne ((IsLocalRing.residue R) x) 0) (IsUnit x)
decl:
lemma residue_ne_zero_iff_isUnit (x : R) : residue R x ≠ 0 ↔ IsUnit x := by
  simp

name: IsLocalRing.residue_surjective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ Function.Surjective ⇑(IsLocalRing.residue R)
decl:
lemma residue_surjective :
    Function.Surjective (IsLocalRing.residue R) :=
  Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective

name: IsLocalRing.instIsScalarTowerResidueField
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : CommRing R
inst✝⁶ : IsLocalRing R
R₁ : Type u_4
R₂ : Type u_5
inst✝⁵ : CommRing R₁
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R₂
inst✝³ : Algebra R₁ R₂
inst✝² : Algebra R₁ R
inst✝¹ : Algebra R₂ R
inst✝ : IsScalarTower R₁ R₂ R
⊢ IsScalarTower R₁ R₂ (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R)
decl:
instance {R₁ R₂} [CommRing R₁] [CommRing R₂]
    [Algebra R₁ R₂] [Algebra R₁ R] [Algebra R₂ R] [IsScalarTower R₁ R₂ R] :
    IsScalarTower R₁ R₂ (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R) := by
  delta IsLocalRing.ResidueField; infer_instance

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.algebraMap_eq
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ Eq (algebraMap R (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R)) (IsLocalRing.residue R)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ResidueField.algebraMap_eq : algebraMap R (ResidueField R) = residue R :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.instIsLocalHomResidueFieldRingHomResidue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ IsLocalHom (IsLocalRing.residue R)
decl:
instance : IsLocalHom (IsLocalRing.residue R) :=
  ⟨fun _ ha =>
    Classical.not_not.mp (Ideal.Quotient.eq_zero_iff_mem.not.mp (isUnit_iff_ne_zero.mp ha))⟩

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.lift_comp_residue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_4
S : Type u_5
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : IsLocalRing R
inst✝¹ : Field S
f : RingHom R S
inst✝ : IsLocalHom f
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.lift f).comp (IsLocalRing.residue R)) f
decl:
theorem lift_comp_residue {R S : Type*} [CommRing R] [IsLocalRing R] [Field S] (f : R →+* S)
    [IsLocalHom f] : (lift f).comp (residue R) = f :=
  RingHom.ext fun _ => rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.lift_residue_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_4
S : Type u_5
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : IsLocalRing R
inst✝¹ : Field S
f : RingHom R S
inst✝ : IsLocalHom f
x : R
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.lift f) ((IsLocalRing.residue R) x)) (f x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem lift_residue_apply {R S : Type*} [CommRing R] [IsLocalRing R] [Field S] (f : R →+* S)
    [IsLocalHom f] (x) : lift f (residue R x) = f x :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_id
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (RingHom.id R)) (RingHom.id (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R))
decl:
/-- Applying `IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map` to the identity ring homomorphism gives the identity
ring homomorphism. -/
@[simp]
theorem map_id :
    IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (RingHom.id R) = RingHom.id (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R) :=
  Ideal.Quotient.ringHom_ext <| RingHom.ext fun _ => rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_comp
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : CommRing R
inst✝⁶ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝⁵ : CommRing S
inst✝⁴ : IsLocalRing S
inst✝³ : CommRing T
inst✝² : IsLocalRing T
f : RingHom T R
g : RingHom R S
inst✝¹ : IsLocalHom f
inst✝ : IsLocalHom g
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (g.comp f)) ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map g).comp (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map f))
decl:
/-- The composite of two `IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map`s is the `IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map` of
the composite. -/
theorem map_comp (f : T →+* R) (g : R →+* S) [IsLocalHom f] [IsLocalHom g] :
    IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (g.comp f) =
      (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map g).comp (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map f) :=
  Ideal.Quotient.ringHom_ext <| RingHom.ext fun _ => rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_comp_residue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝² : CommRing S
inst✝¹ : IsLocalRing S
f : RingHom R S
inst✝ : IsLocalHom f
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map f).comp (IsLocalRing.residue R)) ((IsLocalRing.residue S).comp f)
decl:
theorem map_comp_residue (f : R →+* S) [IsLocalHom f] :
    (ResidueField.map f).comp (residue R) = (residue S).comp f :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_residue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝² : CommRing S
inst✝¹ : IsLocalRing S
f : RingHom R S
inst✝ : IsLocalHom f
r : R
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map f) ((IsLocalRing.residue R) r)) ((IsLocalRing.residue S) (f r))
decl:
theorem map_residue (f : R →+* S) [IsLocalHom f] (r : R) :
    ResidueField.map f (residue R r) = residue S (f r) :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_id_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
x : IsLocalRing.ResidueField R
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (RingHom.id R)) x) x
decl:
theorem map_id_apply (x : ResidueField R) : map (RingHom.id R) x = x :=
  DFunLike.congr_fun map_id x

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map_map
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : CommRing R
inst✝⁶ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝⁵ : CommRing S
inst✝⁴ : IsLocalRing S
inst✝³ : CommRing T
inst✝² : IsLocalRing T
f : RingHom R S
g : RingHom S T
x : IsLocalRing.ResidueField R
inst✝¹ : IsLocalHom f
inst✝ : IsLocalHom g
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map g) ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map f) x)) ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map (g.comp f)) x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_map (f : R →+* S) (g : S →+* T) (x : ResidueField R) [IsLocalHom f]
    [IsLocalHom g] : map g (map f x) = map (g.comp f) x :=
  DFunLike.congr_fun (map_comp f g).symm x

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : IsLocalRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing S
inst✝ : IsLocalRing S
f : RingEquiv R S
a : IsLocalRing.ResidueField R
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv f) a) ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.map ↑f) a)
decl:
/-- A ring isomorphism defines an isomorphism of residue fields. -/
@[simps apply]
def mapEquiv (f : R ≃+* S) : IsLocalRing.ResidueField R ≃+* IsLocalRing.ResidueField S where
  toFun := map (f : R →+* S)
  invFun := map (f.symm : S →+* R)
  left_inv x := by simp only [map_map, RingEquiv.symm_comp, map_id, RingHom.id_apply]
  right_inv x := by simp only [map_map, RingEquiv.comp_symm, map_id, RingHom.id_apply]
  map_mul' := RingHom.map_mul _
  map_add' := RingHom.map_add _

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv.symm
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : IsLocalRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing S
inst✝ : IsLocalRing S
f : RingEquiv R S
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv f).symm (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv f.symm)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mapEquiv.symm (f : R ≃+* S) : (mapEquiv f).symm = mapEquiv f.symm :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv_trans
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝⁵ : CommRing R
inst✝⁴ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝³ : CommRing S
inst✝² : IsLocalRing S
inst✝¹ : CommRing T
inst✝ : IsLocalRing T
e₁ : RingEquiv R S
e₂ : RingEquiv S T
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv (e₁.trans e₂)) ((IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv e₁).trans (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv e₂))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mapEquiv_trans (e₁ : R ≃+* S) (e₂ : S ≃+* T) :
    mapEquiv (e₁.trans e₂) = (mapEquiv e₁).trans (mapEquiv e₂) :=
  RingEquiv.toRingHom_injective <| map_comp (e₁ : R →+* S) (e₂ : S →+* T)

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv_refl
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv (RingEquiv.refl R)) (RingEquiv.refl (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mapEquiv_refl : mapEquiv (RingEquiv.refl R) = RingEquiv.refl _ :=
  RingEquiv.toRingHom_injective map_id

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapAut_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
f : RingEquiv R R
⊢ Eq (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapAut f) (IsLocalRing.ResidueField.mapEquiv f)
decl:
/-- The group homomorphism from `RingAut R` to `RingAut k` where `k`
is the residue field of `R`. -/
@[simps]
def mapAut : RingAut R →* RingAut (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R) where
  toFun := mapEquiv
  map_mul' e₁ e₂ := mapEquiv_trans e₂ e₁
  map_one' := mapEquiv_refl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.residue_smul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : IsLocalRing R
G : Type u_4
inst✝¹ : Group G
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction G R
g : G
r : R
⊢ Eq ((IsLocalRing.residue R) (HSMul.hSMul g r)) (HSMul.hSMul g ((IsLocalRing.residue R) r))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem residue_smul (g : G) (r : R) : residue R (g • r) = g • residue R r :=
  rfl

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.instIsScalarTower
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : CommRing R
inst✝⁴ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝³ : CommRing S
inst✝² : IsLocalRing S
inst✝¹ : Algebra R S
inst✝ : IsLocalHom (algebraMap R S)
⊢ IsScalarTower R (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R) (IsLocalRing.ResidueField S)
decl:
instance : IsScalarTower R (ResidueField R) (ResidueField S) :=
  IsScalarTower.of_algebraMap_eq (congrFun rfl)

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.finiteDimensional_of_noetherian
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝⁶ : CommRing R
inst✝⁵ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝⁴ : CommRing S
inst✝³ : IsLocalRing S
inst✝² : Algebra R S
inst✝¹ : IsLocalHom (algebraMap R S)
inst✝ : IsNoetherian R S
⊢ FiniteDimensional (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R) (IsLocalRing.ResidueField S)
decl:
instance finiteDimensional_of_noetherian [IsNoetherian R S] :
    FiniteDimensional (ResidueField R) (ResidueField S) := by
  apply IsNoetherian.iff_fg.mp <|
    isNoetherian_of_tower R (S := ResidueField R) (M := ResidueField S) _
  convert isNoetherian_of_surjective S (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R (maximalIdeal S)).toLinearMap
    (LinearMap.range_eq_top.mpr Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective)

-- We want to be able to refer to `hfin`

name: IsLocalRing.ResidueField.finite_of_finite
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝⁶ : CommRing R
inst✝⁵ : IsLocalRing R
inst✝⁴ : CommRing S
inst✝³ : IsLocalRing S
inst✝² : Algebra R S
inst✝¹ : IsLocalHom (algebraMap R S)
inst✝ : IsNoetherian R S
hfin : Finite (IsLocalRing.ResidueField R)
⊢ Finite (IsLocalRing.ResidueField S)
decl:
set_option linter.unusedVariables false in
lemma finite_of_finite [IsNoetherian R S] (hfin : Finite (ResidueField R)) :
    Finite (ResidueField S) := Module.finite_of_finite (ResidueField R)

name: IsLocalRing.isLocalHom_residue
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : IsLocalRing R
⊢ IsLocalHom (IsLocalRing.residue R)
decl:
theorem isLocalHom_residue : IsLocalHom (IsLocalRing.residue R) := by
  constructor
  intro a ha
  by_contra h
  erw [Ideal.Quotient.eq_zero_iff_mem.mpr ((IsLocalRing.mem_maximalIdeal _).mpr h)] at ha
  exact ha.ne_zero rfl
